info.name: Hide Gawker Sidebar
info.description: Hides the huge, unnecessary sidebar from all Gawker blogs.
info.additionalInfo: Applies to: http://lifehacker.com/*, http://gizmodo.com/*, http://gawker.com/*, http://deadspin.com/*, http://io9.com/*, http://kotaku.com/*, http://jalopnik.com/*, http://jezebel.com/*
